item.g:title: Multicolor Net Embroidered Festival Lehenga Choli
item.g:description: Multicolor festival lehenga choli intricate with zari thread, sequins work, stone work, neck work, floral work, leaf work, patch work, keri work and patch patti border work.This lehenga choli is stitched and can be customized from chest size 26 to 36 inches.As shown matching Net dupatta and Benarasi Silk choli are available with this.The lehenga style will be as shown in image.Accessories which is shown in the image is only for shooting purpose.Slight variation in color and patch border is possible.

item.g:title: Off-white Net and Jacquard Embroidered Festival Lehenga Choli
item.g:description: Off-white embroidered festival lehenga choli intricate with zari thread, sequins work, neck work, moti work, floral work, leaf work, keri work, patch work and patch patti border work.Embroidered work is done on the backside of the lehenga choli.Available with Off-white Net-Jacquard Choli and Off-white Net Dupatta.Faux Georgette fabric is used as the lining of the lehenga choli.This lehenga choli is stitched and can be customized from chest size 26 to 36 inches with matching sleeves of 5-6 inches. If you want full sleeves then you can choose full net sleeves @3usd.The lehenga style will be as shown in image.Accessories which is shown in the image is only for shooting purpose.Slight variation in color and patch border is possible.Sizes will be assumed to be exact body measurements.
